newsitem.title: POLAND: Poland gives PLN 30 mln of food to flood victims.
newsitem.headline: Poland gives PLN 30 mln of food to flood victims.

text.p: The Polish state Agriculture Market Agency (ARR) said on Monday it gave 30 million zlotys ($9 million) worth of butter, fat and canned meat to local authorities in 11 Polish provinces affected by floods.
It said in a statement the food would be distributed to the needy by provincial flood committees coordinating the rescue efforts.
Floods have swamped thousands of square kilometres of southern Poland including dozens of towns and cities during the past week, killing at least 36 people.
